column4: how to delete multiple files within a directory recursively(subdir too) with a specific extension .. eg. all .pyc files
how to delete multiple files within a directory recursively(subdir too) with a specific extension? .. eg. all .pyc files
something like command `find . -name "*.pyc"` i think, run it with ls instead of rm first to make sure i didnt mess it up badly... (and can someone please check that plz?)
